import React,{useContext} from "react"; import { Col, Container, Row, Card, Button } from "react-bootstrap"; import "./Products.css" import Context from "./Store/context"; const Products=()=>{ const Cartctx=useContext(Context) const AddHandler=()=>{} return(
Album 1 $100 Album 2 $50 Album 3 $70 Album 4 $100
) } export default Products
